title: Enhle Mbali to debut her collection at SA Fashion Week
text:
Enhle Mbali to debut her collection at SA Fashion Week share this

Johannesburg - Actress Enhle Mbali has announced her new collection will be showcased at this year’s SA Fashion Week. In a video posted to Instagram the businesswoman shared details of her Essie label.



READ MORE: Enhle Mbali opens up about cheating scandals during interview with DJ Zinhle

"I’m so excited to announce I’ll be showing for the first time on fashion week on the 23/10/19 for autumn winter 2020. Essie apparel. So excited to share a piece of me with you," she wrote

The-31-year old said she has been working on the collection throughout the year and that it interprets all four seasons in a stylish, fashionable and graceful way.

WATCH THE VIDEO HERE:

description: The-31-year old said she has been working on the collection throughout the year and that it interprets all four seasons in a stylish, fashionable and graceful way.
